name: Contra Demake

description: A demake of Castlevania in PICO-8

name: Pico Tower

name: Katamar1k
description:
An homage to Katamari Damacy for Pico8 in 1021 bytes for the #PICO1k jam.

Collect enough things with your Katamari ball to reach 64cm as fast as possible to please the King of all Cosmos.

name: Pac-Man
description: NABU is an obscure computer system produced in 1983, most notable for featuring an early equivalent of internet connectivity. A port of Pac-Man (among numerous other games) is built-in to the computer itself.

name: Wolfenstein 3D
description: A demake of the first level of Wolfenstein 3D in PICO-8.

name: Z-Man
description: A bootleg port of Pac-Man for the ZX Spectrum. It would later be released as an official Pac-Man title.

name: Pac-Man
description: A port of Pac-Man for old iPods.

name: Every Extend Extra: Pico-8 Edition
description: A PICO-8 demake of of the PSP game Every Extend Extra, an arcade game about detonating your ship, causing colourful chain reactions in the enemies, granting you points.

name: Pac-Man
description:
Included as a bonus game in the SNES version of Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures/Hello, Pac-Man!; was never released in a standalone form.
Similar to the Famicom/NES version, but features slightly updated graphics and a high-score table.

name: Pac-Man
description:
Included as a bonus game bundled with the X68000 port of Pac-Mania.
The ghost AI is very off, with the ghosts rarely attacking Pac-Man.

name: The Hallways
description: Hallways is a horror game, where you find yourself trapped in loops of ever-changing corridors. With a special flashlight that reveals hidden paths and objects.

name: Trigonarium
description: A PICO-8 demake of Trigonarium, a top down twin stick shooter with an everchanging map. Fight your way through an arena of 12 enemy types through 4 different gamemodes while the map changes shape around you.

name: Pac-Man
description: Port of Pac-Man for MZ-700/1200 computers.

name: Pac-Man
description: Port of Pac-Man for MZ-1500 computers.

name: Dream Antique
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac-Man
description: A port of Pac-Man for the FM-77 computer.

name: Pac-Man
description: The Xbox Live version of Pac-Man is a direct port of the arcade original, but fixes the kill screen on level 256, making the game playable beyond that level. It also adds a score board.

name: Far Cry 3: High Tides
description:
The co-op story is far from over. Hoyt’s privateers have ambushed the four survivors and taken them hostage. It’s up to you and your friends to escape an underground prison and find a way off this island of insanity.

This Free High Tides DLC Pack Includes:

2 New Co-op Maps: Jailbreak & Redemption
4 New Co-op Skins: "Warrior-ized" Leonard, Tisha, Callum & Mikhael

name: Meikyuu Ryuuki
description:
Meikyuu Ryuuki is an roguelike game. This was first shown as a submission in VIPRPG 2023 Kouhaku. The original language of the game is Japanese, but volunteers have created an English patch that you can download and use on the official page.

This is a Mysterious Dungeon type and includes homages to several works.

name: Stlthscpe
description: This is a PICO-8 port of Stealthscape, a top-down momentum based speed game that has you pitted against a wide variety of enemies and obstacles while you try to quickly make your way to the portal at the end of each stage.

name: Picoman Go
description: A PICO-8 demake of Hitman Go for the demake jam including levels from the original.

name: The Stone of Destiny
description: Sin descripción

name: Saitekikai Spy Simulator
description: In this game, you control a group of industrial spies, such as "head of household" and "drug addict" (to be added in the future), and infiltrate them into facilities that are hostile to your company. The aim of the game is to accomplish the requests without letting the spies get caught by security.

name: Medusa the Origin: Lost Dream of the Deep
description: The story begins in Zhijiang in June 2022. The idol group A-Soul. This work has designed more than 20 different scenes and 10 special events with CG, and created scripts with more than 80000 Chinese characters.

name: AftLife: Girl and Cats, and Lost World
description: A girl and cats make "Heartful Comedy & Mystery" Comedy depicting calm everyday! The big mystery is solved in story. New Stories from Update Story is composed of short stories that are completed. Please wait for update!

description: Sin descripción

description: This is a visual novel game with the theme of furry characters and same-sex love. You will play a human character who is about to become a furry man in the game, break into a small town in southwest China by mistake, and get involved in the local wonderful past.

name: Crowning Calamity
description: Sin descripción

name: The Mist City
description: You fall into the river by accident under the guidance of the unknown and mysterious power. Then you wake up in an empty city and meet another 12 people who have the same experience as you.

name: Death Angel Trial
description: This is a game about online violence, all of which are based on the personal experience of the producer and shared with netizens. As far as possible to reduce the reality of one after another bloody cruel phenomenon. Today's victims may only be a little-known person, and the next It could be you.

name: Echoes of Nocturnal Chords
description: About the game: On a quiet midnight, a famous girl suddenly disappears unexpectedly. The protagonist followed the clue obtained at the girl's house all the way to the back of the mountain, but when they met, something strange happened ...

name: Salvation Plan: Spirit Evil
description: Sin descripción

name: Trace of Time
description: Control the protagonist to explore the remote island, the unknown ruins of the sky, to find the source of magic, save his most treasured person.

name: Spot The Differences 2020
description: Spot The Differences 2020 is a classic game to find different. Collect a large number of scenery, places of interest, beautiful women pictures, find out the difference, complete the challenge, test your eyesight and test your efficiency.

name: Desire Gambling House
description: Desire Gambling House is a classic 21-point card game, in which there will be four unique beautiful women as your opponents, they will even use clothes as a bet, do you...continue?

name: Girls Battlegrounds
description: Survive this massive girls' battle royal.

name: Kakkouke
description: An all age-oriented BL different world adventure visual novel game. The hero Kai, who is a brave but a disadvantaged character, will start a thrilling adventure story with people (fish) with different personalities who will meet during the adventure.

name: Overlapping World
description: Zhang Xiao, a senior high school student, has a strange power called “Master Key”. Since he was young, he can communicate with other “worlds”. One day, Zhang Xiao’s classmate Miao Xueling had an accident.

name: I Will Become a Swordsman
description: I Will Become a Swordsman is one of the earliest works of swordsmen of all ages. In search of a mysterious power to fight against the unknown world, the main characters seek the help of a legendary swordsman.

name: Windy Mystletainn
description: The king asked you to take an artifact to kill the monster and save the princess, but you think it's not too late to kill the king first and then save the princess!?

name: Aeon on Mosaic: Anemone
description: Five stories, a life. In an accident, the man named "Miracle" met the girl he hit, and the trajectory of his life has changed since then. Ten years, in the scattered fragments of time, witness together his precious memories.

name: Vagabond Inn
description: Sin descripción

name: Patrol no Gunji Hakubutsukan 3: Chouzetsu Muteki Kyuukyoku Heiki
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternal Liiivie: EP1 Liiivie - Isolated From the World
description: One night, Ita and Margarcia escaped from the village and became traitors. Various mysteries and conspiracies hidden in the mountain village have also begun the prologue.

name: The Dawn
description: The Dawn is an interactive game. In the end-time background, how do you survive in the face of various indescribable horror monsters? Faced with the intertwining of human good and evil, what is your choice? In Dawn of the end, everything will have an answer.

name: Tactics & Strategy Master 3: Gemini Strategy
description: Sin descripción

name: Guardian Legend
description: Guardian Legend is a q RPG game. Lovely modelling, nostalgic style of the scene, humorous dialogue, can take you into a relaxed and happy fairy tale world. If you like this style, don't miss it.

name: Tetraminis Deffect
description: A PICO-8 demake of Tetris Effect.

name: Li'l Rumble
description:
It's a Pico-8 Battle Royale! Well sort of anyway...

Thrown on to a big island chock full of weapons, it's every man/cat/alien for themselves! Play either you vs 19 others or watch as 20 AI controlled opponents duke it out amongst themselves.

name: Arrowmania
description: A low-res 4 key rhythm game inspired by games such as Stepmania & DDR.

name: Cuber 3: Schmidt
description:
Explore the world of Cuber, where you jump, fall, die and rage.

This is a game all about the character named Cuber to get to the end of each level. Each level is unique and hard in it's own way.

What is the end of each level find out...

name: Portal Pro
description: Portal Pro is a set of test chambers focusing on solving puzzles locally rather than using complex fling techniques. The goal here is that the solutions are hard to come up with but easy to actually do.

name: Super Mario 64 Xbox
description: A fork of the Super Mario 64 PC unofficial port.

- Steel Book (Collector`s art)

name: Aperture Ireland
description: Aperture Ireland tells the story of a test subject in one of Aperture's regional branches. Solve puzzles and dodge bullets as you start to unravel the facility's dark secret.

name: Desolation
description: Sin descripción

name: Pac-Mania
description: Pac-Mania is a variation on the game Pac-Man. You need to guide Pac-Man around a maze and eat all of the dots on the board to proceed on to the next round. Numerous, multi-colored ghosts also roam the maze trying to stop you. If you eat one of the power pellets in the maze, the ghosts will temporarily turn blue and run from you. Pac-Man can earn bonus points by eating the ghosts when they are in this state. The maze is now shown in isometric perspective and is larger than the screen which will scroll to follow the action. To help get out of tight spots, Pac-Man can now jump. But be careful, because some of the ghosts have learned this trick as well and you could end up in a mid-air collision!

name: Aperture: Salt Mines
description: Aperture: Salt Mines is a community-made modification for Portal 2. Set in the same universe as the original games, descend into the heart of Aperture in the year 1998, shortly after the death of Cave Johnson.

name: Pac-Man
description: A port of Pac-Man for the NEC PC-8000.

name: Pac-Man
description: A port of Pac-Man for the Sharp Zaurus PDA.

name: Ultra 2000 Series: Pac-Man
description: A port of Pac-Man released in Japan as part of the Ultra 2000 Series.

name: Namco All-Stars: Pac-Man
description: Unlike most other Pac-Man PC ports, the Namco All-Stars port do not use emulation and it's similar to the early iOS version of the game.

name: Namco All-Stars: Dig Dug
description: Dig Dug is a 1-2 player arcade game in which you have to use your shovel to dig your way through the earth. Stopping you from doing this are two monsters, called Pooka and Fygar, who will continually chase you around. The only weapon that you carry is an air pump, which you can use to inflate the monsters to the point where they explode (if you start to inflate them but stop doing so, the monsters will get turned back to their normal selves).

name: Namco All-Stars: Pac-Man and Dig Dug
description: Sin descripción

name: The Tomorrow War: White Spike Invasion
description: Exterminate the human race in this arcade action shooter! Thirty years in the future, Earth is besieged by a global alien menace. Become the alien threat and destroy the earthlings once and for all as you blast through wave after wave of their remaining forces!

name: Hyperbound
description:
HyperBound is a game hack project that follows the trials and tribulations of an unnamed amnesiac, who is thrust into a world that is completely unknown to him. Playing with the affordances of the Super Nintendo game EarthBound, HyperBound explores ideas associated with videogames such as non-linear narratives and spacial storytelling.

The hack’s core game-play mechanic is the use of glitches as a metaphor for the deterioration of memory, with one of the central trials of the game’s story takes place inside the protagonist’s mind.

Its first public exhibition took place at the 2007 Axis New Media Festival (from September 7th to September 16th)

name: Muito, Muito Minimalista: FES
description:
The most minimalist platformer ever created, now FES!
Venture into a simple and fun platform game with great challenges! Collect all the coins to unlock the next level!

name: Impasse Journey: Kaohsiung Chapter
description: In post-apocalyptic Taiwan, a young girl, Yang Qiongqi, arrives in Kaohsiung. To fulfill a promise to her father, she is forced to stop in her journey, although in this very place, her icy heart begins to stir once more. In such a lawless world, what on earth could keep the smile in her?

name: Columns
description: A port of Columns for the Sharp Zaurus PDA.

name: Galaxian
description: A port of Galaxian for the Sharp Zaurus PDA.

name: Xevious
description: A port of Xevious for the Sharp Zaurus PDA.

name: Interstellar Flames
description: Sin descripción

name: Candy Cruncher
description: Sin descripción

name: Void Terrarium 2: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition includes:
- The Deluxe Edition of the game
- "Terrarium Tunes" 1-disc Official Soundtrack
- "Growing Together" Acrylic Standee
- "Friendly Faces" Art Card
- Collector's Box

name: Plants vs. Zombies Presents: Talking Zombatar
description:
Talking Zombatar was a Talking Tom-like video game for iOS and Android that was being developed by PopCap and was going to be published by EA. That game featured a zombie who, if spoken to, would repeat what the user said back to them. The zombie could dance and be dressed up; there was also a camera with AR support for users to take photos and videos with.

It is unknown why this game was canceled.

name: Pac-Jr.
description: A modified version of Ms. Pac-Man (the Sega Genesis port) which appears as a bonus game in the Sega Genesis version of Pac-Man 2: The New Adventures.

name: Escape from Area 99
description:
This is the sequel of Half Life: Operation Rosenberg.

While Operation Rosenberg was taking place, Barney Calhoun and Dr. Rosenberg were finding they way out of Area 99 (a hidden and dirty sector of Black Mesa).

Suddenly, they were captured by Black Ops. You will play as Barney and your mission will be to escape from that hideous government facility.

name: Plants vs. Zombies: Project Hot Tub
description: Project Hot Tub was an open-world action-adventure game that combined the open-world gameplay of Uncharted 4: A Thief's End, the combat of Batman: Arkham Knight, and the family-friendly vibes of Ratchet & Clank. The game was being worked on by PopCap Vancouver in around 2015 and was planned to be released in early 2017. According to sources gathered by IGN, in the second half of 2016, the game was ready to show off to EA executives, but little did they know, EA would trash Project Hot Tub a few days later in order for them to get more working hands on the now-canceled Star Wars game codenamed Project Ragtag.

name: Kono Bushitsu ha Kitaku Shinai-bu ga Senkyo Shimashita: Portable - Gakuen Dog Year-hen
description: PSP visual novel released in 2012

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story
description: Puzzle and Visual Novel mobile title, based on the anime.

name: 100 Dino Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the Dino park with Cats and Dinos! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of dinosaurs location and dino-cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game. Can you find them all?

name: One Drop
description: Help a tiny, fragile robot overcome treacherous obstacles and escape a desolate planet! An expansive cosmic adventure awaits you!

name: Love Amidst the Timeless Rift
description:
Embark on a captivating journey with this short fantasy Boys' Love visual novel.

Time has frozen for everyone except our hero and his fellow guild members.
Turns out, our villain is kidnapping and brainwashing an army of people for his grand castle renovation.
Yet, the key to saving everyone lies in...

ENTERTAINING HIM AND CONFESSING YOUR SECRETS?!?! WITH YOUR GUIlD MEMBERS?!?!

name: Peeping Tom
description: First you only see a window with four closed blinds. Behind the blinds enemy spacecraft move about and shoot at you. If you hit one of the enemies behind the blinds by pure chance the blind will open.

name: Deers and Deckards
description: You goes to visit your best friend for a fun weekend of games. There you also get to meet his dad, making the stay more eventful then expected...

name: Hard Hat: Rebuild
description: Sin descripción

name: Enter the Titan
description: Enter the Titan is a roguelike deckbuilder where you destroy the invading titans from within. It plays out in the interior of colossal titans, with turn-based tactical platforming on a 2D spatial grid with gravity.

name: Another Door
description: Another Door is a semi-cooperative game that combines board game and roguelike elements, for an adventure between betrayal and forced friendship. Confront cursed creatures, hide your intentions and be the smartest if you want to save your soul...

name: Skillwood
description: Skillwood is a survival simulator highlighting resource foraging. Chop trees, mine stones, and skillfully level up your abilities to upgrade buildings with the gathered resources. Go through the continous progression by unlocking more areas and buildings

name: Iii Demake
description: A PICO-8 demake of iii, a little "catroidvania" about a one-eyed cat leaving his comfort zone. Explore underground caverns, gain vision of other dimensions, help the inhabitants, and expand your horizons.

name: Oli Boo Chu
description: Pac Man inspired maze game

name: Harry Obby
description: Harry Potter fan game with obstacle courses. It is a sandbox game and you can explore anywhere at Hogwarts. There are four houses for the player to select. The objective of the player is to collect all of the Famous Witches and Wizards Cards from the game.

name: World Without Reason
description: A visual novel about a young adult living through several key moments in her life, as she tries to remember important details about her past.

name: Grimshire
description: A deadly plague threatens the village of Grimshire. Manage your farmland, forage the bounty of the wilds, prevent your harvest from rotting away and keep the root cellar full. Can you help bring the community together and survive?

name: Shave N Quit
description: Its your first day on the job at the local hair salon. Just do your best, ok?

name: Cats and Seek: Dino Park
description: John and Emily are on a date to Dino Park. Turns out, not only are there lots of dinosaurs, but there are also many cats playing and hiding there ! Let's play hide and seek with the cats in Dino Park! Can you find them all?

name: Scaleton
description: A puzzle-platformer browser game. Part of the Lemniscate Games series.

name: Warface: Clutch
description: Warface: Clutch is a contemporary first person shooter with millions of fans around the world. Five unique classes with special skills, teamwork, exciting PVE missions and raids, various PVP modes, hundreds of realistic weapons, modules, equipment and camo items. Play for free!

name: Ah Nanjarin
description: Strange creature "Nanjarin" enjoy the game Ikusei Simulation foster growth. Living together, Teru Iku Nanjarin if you are changing in different shapes, babies, children, there are 22 different kinds of characters and all the adults together. Nanjarin fate or whatever really, ascertain their own eyes.

name: Isotopia
description: A fast-paced first-person action game where you explore, fight, and destruct in a fully destructible voxel world, developing skills and uncovering the secrets of forgotten civilizations.

name: Rilakkuma Farm
description:
A Rilakkuma farming game!

Grow crops and turn them into delicious foods at a variety of stores
Decorate your garden with all kinds of ornaments
Enjoy the good life with Rilakkuma and friends on the farm

name: Friendzone
description: Friendzone is a visual novel-dating sim that began as a small hobby project for my friends, but evolved into a full-fledged dating sim. Featuring 12 romantic routes, 10-12 hours of original content (that's over 17,500 blocks of dialogue), and a plethora of minigames, Friendzone (using a wacky cast and zany situations) captures the cute, heartwarming, and sometimes awkward aspects of romance in high school. Whoops, that's the school bell. We'll see you in homeroom!

name: Legion Otherworld
description: Action role playing game set in a new fantasy world where you assume the role of village hero and try to stop a foe from conquering the area.

name: Rilakkuma Rhythm: Mattari Kibun de Da Run Run Run
description: A Rilakkuma DS game.

name: Celeste 64: Fragments of the Mountain
description: Relive the magic of Celeste Mountain alongside Madeline in this small, heartfelt 3D platformer. Created in a week(ish) by the Celeste team to celebrate the game’s sixth anniversary.

name: Nayuta no Kiseki
description: Nayuta no Kiseki is an action role-playing game that was released on July 26th, 2012. The title has a completely new setting, new characters and even a new game system from previous "Kiseki" games. It is also the first game in the Kiseki series to drop the "Legend of Heroes" title.

name: Hello Kitty's The Land of Hidden Objects: DokokanaArcana
description: Hello Kitty and her friends accompany you as you search and tap different hidden characters and items! Find them quickly to achieve combos and get a high score!

name: Hello Kitty: White Present
description: Hello Kitty White Present is an platformer Playstation game. The story begins when a earthquake happens in Monkey kingdom and destroys the castle, when that happens two little monkeys decide to go to Kitty's house and ask for help. The game begins in Hello Kitty's house attic and then the adventure will go to places like the Fairy in the Deep Forest, amusement parks, etc.

name: Nayuta no Kiseki: Limited Edition
description:
The Limited Edition of Nayuta no Kiseki includes:
- Nayuta no Kiseki (PSP)
- Original Drama CD
- Pom Reel Pass Case (Pre-Order Only)

name: Pacmario
description: Pacmario is a mini hack of Super Mario 64, crossover of Mario and Pac-Man, with 6 Stars.

name: OvenBreak
description: OvenBreak is a 2D side-scrolling endless runner/auto-run platformer starring the gingerbread man named GingerBrave. He is trying to escape from the witch who baked him. He runs by himself at a constant speed. The player needs to make him jump above obstacles, slide underneath them and use his candy cane as a hook to get over larger gaps. On the journey through side-scrolling levels, the gingerbread man collects a trail of jelly beans for scores. He can collect regular jelly beans and if he manages to spell FREEDOM by collecting alphabet jelly beans, he is granted an extra life.

name: Floor Observer
description: You are being hired by the unknown company to observe the area of a different places with the special elevator. Your job is to observe the floor and make sure that everything is in place on each floor. If something is wrong, press the red button, if not, press the white button. Can you make it to floor 30 and survive this job?

description: Travel Mosaics 13 - Spectacular Amsterdam takes you to beautiful Holland for a relaxing Puzzle vacation! Stroll through the picturesque city and take in the gorgeous sights. There's plenty of see and discover, including fun trivia as you play!

name: Travel Mosaics 14: Perfect Stockholm
description: The Walkers invite you to take a walk along the narrow-paved streets of Stockholm and enjoy the views of its picturesque canals and restrained architecture. Learn interesting facts about the most fascinating landmarks of the capital of Sweden while completing challenging puzzles!

Pac-Man can earn bonus points by eating the ghosts when they are in this state. The maze is now shown in isometric perspective and is larger than the screen which will scroll to follow the action. To help get out of tight spots, Pac-Man can now jump. But be careful, because some of the ghosts have learned this trick as well and you could end up in a mid-air collision!

Experience in vivid detail the story of Shirou Emiya, a teenage boy with dreams of becoming a Hero of Justice, and his battle revolving around the omnipotent wish-granting vessel, the Holy Grail.

name: Steppenwolf: The X-Creatures Project
description:
Steppenwolf: The X-Creatures Project is a 2001 episodic action-adventure video game developed by Sarbakan and published by Warner Bros. Studios. The game centers around two characters, Meg Crimson and Alan "Steppenwolf" Kane, as they journey around the world in search of the blood samples of various cryptids rumored to have been alive for hundreds of years, all in an effort to finish the X-Creatures Project, an operation designed to grant humans immortality.
The gameplay often revolves around collecting items and interacting with the open world in an attempt to solve a mystery or escape a dangerous situation. In-game quick cut scenes are used to show the effect of an action. The game is split into six chapters, with each consisting of a prologue, four episodes, and, with the exception of the final chapter, a recap.

name: Rise of the Ronin: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Japan, 1863. After three centuries of the Tokugawa Shogunate’s oppressive rule, the Black Ships of the West descend upon the nation’s borders and the country falls into a state of turmoil. Amidst the chaos of war, disease and political unrest, a nameless warrior forges their own path, holding the very fate of Japan in their hands.

As a masterless warrior – a Ronin, your destiny is your own. See the story unfold in different ways depending on the choices you make and the characters you ally with along the way. Face critical mission decisions – like whether to assassinate or protect key figures, and shape the course of history through a rich multi-choice system.

name: Wings of Endless
description:
Wings of Endless" is an action RPG that captivates with its platforming elements and a rich, pixel-art visual style. The game unfolds the story of Hariku, a confident bounty hunter whose routine mission evolves into an expansive quest, revealing the layers of a long-forgotten war. Accompanied by Owly, his mysterious talking owl, and a cast of unexpected allies, Hariku's journey spans across diverse and vivid landscapes filled with secrets, from desolate deserts and lush forests to icy expanses and marshlands​​​​.

The gameplay is dynamic, emphasizing a combat system that allows players to control three distinct heroes, each with unique abilities, and switch between them in real-time to unleash powerful combos. This system, alongside a vast world ripe for exploration, numerous side missions, a variety of challenging enemies, and intricate puzzles, ensures a gameplay experience that is both engaging and rewarding. Additionally, the game features a crafting system for consumables, further enriching the gameplay with strategic elements​

description: A series of mysterious murders takes place in a small provincial town. Detective Cooper must unravel a tangle of mystical, chilling events to get to the bottom of the mystery.

name: Castles on Clouds
description: A Roguelike Tower Defense game set on a user controlled procedurally generated island. Select unique cards and relics that enhance your towers abilities, crafting powerful builds to defend against the growing hordes of enemies.

name: Catacomb Rogue Clawsaders
description: Welcome to Catacomb Rogue Clawsaders! In this deckbuilding roguelite you'll embark on an dark journey alongside a fearless band of kitties as they claw their way through hordes of monstrous adversaries lurking within the corridors of a strange catacomb.

name: Suki na Mono ha Suki Dakara Shouganai!! First Limit & Target Nights Sukisho! Episode #1+ #2
description:
A PS2 port of Suki na Mono wa Suki Dakara Shouganai and its sequel.

Has full voices, new CG and music collection.

name: Suki na Mono ha Suki Dakara Shouganai!! Rain Sukisyo Episode #3
description: A PS2 port of Suki na Mono wa Suki Dakara Shouganai!! 3 Rain.

name: Hello Kitty Dream Cafe
description: Hello Kitty Dream Cafe is a restaurant simulation game where you can cook and manage a cafe and help Hello Kitty to become the best chef in the world!

name: Hello Kitty Educational Games
description: Edujoy presents Hello Kitty Educational Games! Help Hello Kitty to complete a lot of activities and boost your creativity and attention skills!

name: Pac-Mania
description: Pac-Mania is a variation on the game Pac-Man. You need to guide Pac-Man around a maze and eat all of the dots on the board to proceed on to the next round. Numerous, multi-colored ghosts also roam the maze trying to stop you. If you eat one of the power pellets in the maze, the ghosts will temporarily turn blue and run from you. Pac-Man can earn bonus points by eating the ghosts when they are in this state. The maze is now shown in isometric perspective and is larger than the screen which will scroll to follow the action. To help get out of tight spots, Pac-Man can now jump. But be careful, because some of the ghosts have learned this trick as well and you could end up in a mid-air collision!

name: Something
description: A game about doing Something

name: Bladerite: Retribution
description: Bladerite offers action game enthusiasts a unique opportunity to polishing gaming skills like never before on cross-platform. Not only can you earn rewards based on defeating opponents in each match, but you can also acquire upgradeable patterns that enhance your game experience. Immerse yourself in a world where the in-game economy is supported by cryptocurrency.

name: Eyes Of Memes
description:
One day you had the bad luck to fall through from your reality into some otherworld. Such incidents sometimes happen and now it has happened to you. From now on you have only one task - to find 8 pictures and leave this strange place.
In terms of gameplay Eyes Of Memes is a classic indie horror in which you have to explore the location in search of pictures. You don't have any weapons, you are always defenseless against the inhabitants of the place and if you encounter them, running away is the only way to escape.

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story - Complete Set
description:
The Complete Set includes:
- The Game
- All 5 Illustration Art Books
- Gotopazu Story Soundtrack
- Complete Quintuplets Set Box

This set was exclusively sold at Maji-Get Stores.

name: I'm counting to 6...
description: Turning onto an old road, the main character gets into an accident due to thick fog. Now he's trying to find someone who can help him. Forced to enter an old house, the main character finds himself trapped, from which it is not so easy to get out.

name: Surveillance Work
description: Surveillance Work is a horror spot-the-difference game where you monitor surveillance camera footage to discover and report anomalies.

name: Black Gunner Wukong
description:
Black Gunner Wukong is a Rougelike type shooting game.
In the game, the player takes on the role of Wukong , who enters a U.S. military base to rescue his master who has been captured by Diden.
In the game, all creatures are identified as armed helicopters and supermarket shopping bags, not as female and male!

name: Half-demon Kamia
description: Half-demon Kamia is in a 3D single-player game, set in an expansive boxed world. Embark on a journey as a being torn between humanity and demonic heritage.

name: Barn Runner 1: The Armageddon Eclair
description: Barn Runner: The Armageddon Eclair is a full-sized game in two chapters that will set you (as Detective Prick Peckard, head of the Robot Crimes Division) hot on the trail of a missing robot as you follow the trail of clues from the Food Courts of your domed city all the way to the untamed green forests of a land that does not officially exist. THRILL to the chase!

name: Vampire Boy
description: Villiam, a young vampire, resides in a grand castle with his family. His only opportunity to venture out and play is on Halloween, when he joins other children for trick-or-treating. However, this Halloween takes an unexpected turn when they encounter Villiam's displeased big sister. In a fit of bad mood, she confiscates all the sweets collected during their trick-or-treating and hides them throughout the castle. Now, Villiam is searching the vast castle to recover all the hidden treats and restore the Halloween joy.

name: Empty Skull
description: "Empty Skull" is a pixelated indie puzzle game with RPG elements that revolves around a skeleton trying to recollect its life.

name: Space Vikings
description: You are flying through the endless space in search for other space ships and planets which you can loot in order to buy troops, weapons and tanks.

name: Jack and Casie Demake
description:
This is a mouse controlled real-time inventory management game, think of it as Attache Case from Resident Evil but things are happening at the same time as you're trying organize it.

It is a demake of the original game by Alex Sian aka Shoutscion.

name: Sphere Game Colours
description: The Sphere Game is about to enchant its loyal fans and win over new enthusiasts. With a complete revitalization, the game offers a completely renewed experience, standing out for stunning visuals and innovative mechanics. Overcome challenging obstacles and dive into an exciting journey, where each stage presents new and thrilling challenges. Your mission is clear: cross the portal to advance to the next level, facing a series of intriguing challenges along the way. Be prepared for an engaging experience where triumph is rewarded, and excitement is always on the horizon.

name: Sonic Megamix Mania
description: Sonic Megamix Mania is a fan-made mod of 'Sonic Mania Plus' that recreates the levels of the original 'Sonic Megamix' Sonic 1 Rom-Hack, as well as re-imagines them in a new mode!

name: Downward
description: What's at the bottom of the pit? Could be anything! Could be everything! I have to find out!

name: Magic Campus
description:
Magic Campus is a classic MMORPG, with turn-based battles and countless missions to complete. The game features many exotic creatures, which can become pets that will accompany you through the vast world of Magic Campus and duel in your defense.

The game has a design with oriental characteristics. All this with beautiful graphics, which make PvP interaction much more fun and exciting. Magic Campus also contains six different character classes, each with different attributes, and a complex clan system that allows interaction between players.

name: Historion: ... und Geschichte wird zum Abenteuer
description: The player is a time traveller with the mission to save the classical era. To do this, he has to solve history-based puzzles, fight enemies and collect four magic gems. The player collects items and stores them in the inventory for further usage. The game takes place in Greek towns, harbors and four of the seven Wonders of the World. An in-game knowledge base is included.

name: Concealed
description: As the first official work of the "Parallel" series, "Concealed" told a story about the mysterious disappearance of some students in "帝英灵" high school. Is it some supernatural powers behind all of this? Facing abundant plot branches and diverse story-driven gameplay, you may need to choose wisely.

name: Planet Zoo: Console Edition - Ultimate Edition
description: The Ultimate Edition includes all Deluxe Content, plus a Season Pass granting access to 14 future console DLC packs

name: Planet Zoo: Console Edition - Deluxe Edition
description: For players looking to expand their zoos with even more animals, scenery and gameplay scenarios, the Deluxe Edition includes 16 additional animals and two additional scenarios, which transport players to both the heart of the tropical rainforests of Southeast Asia and rich, vibrant wetlands.

name: Chemicus II: Die versunkene Stadt
description: A famous professor disappears during an accident in a chemistry laboratory. As his assistant, it is the player's job to find him and solve the mystery around this accident. The player has to find solutions to puzzles with the help of chemistry. The necessary ingredients are stored in the inventory. The game includes a knowledge base.

name: The Science of Staying Awake
description: You ever sit in class sleep deprived to all hell and wonder how long before you start going insane? You ever come home to find some some unidentified disheveled creature-guy-thing in your bed? College is tiring enough. You really don't need this. Unfortunately, this already got attached.

name: Kind Donations
description:
It's a late night at the _____ Museum. The island representative has come in to donate today's haul of insects.

Explore a museum warped by the perspective of its humble curator, burdened with the task of homing his worst nightmare.

A short Animal Crossing horror game about insect donations.

name: Mime
description:
Once upon a time, there was harmony and balance in the world. Four kingdoms of humans have watched over the four elements. But then a traitor appeared, who has angered the Goddess with his selfish deeds. The balance was destroyed, the elements were no more in harmony, and the world plunged into chaos...

Twelve thousand years later, a young knight named Eagle Windeed has been having a strange dream. Maybe there is still salvation for the human race. Maybe it is still possible to make peace with the higher beings. Eagle arrives at a tavern near the Tree Dungeon, determined to find out what his dream meant...

Mime is a dungeon crawler: the entire game is set in a maze-like dungeon environments (with auto-map). There are no "safe" areas; random enemies can pop out anywhere (the random encounter rate is however quite low). Eagle starts alone, but later in the game three other heroes join him. The battles are turn-based, utilizing the standard "attack/magic" formula. There are a few explicit sex scenes in the game.

name: Bingo64
description: A Super Mario 64 ROM hack which adds a bingo mechanic.

name: Cho'Gath Eats the World
description: An arcade-style smash-'em-up centered around destroying tanks, helicopters, enemy champions, and most importantly buildings in pursuit of the titular goal: eating the world!

name: Black Hole
description: Shoot down asteroids while not getting sucked into the black hole by its gravitational pull.

name: The Jumping Alphabet Soup
description:
Sharpen your senses and prepare to dive into the tasty world of words! The Jumping Alphabet Soup takes you through three delicious cuisines, each with its own unique levels and charm.

With 15 challenging levels, this video game will put your word skills to the ultimate test!

name: Worm War
description:
Experience the excitement of "Worm War", where strategy and speed combine in a colorful, candy-inspired world. Navigate your worm with fluid 360-degree movement and outsmart AI opponents in this engaging single-player adventure.

Enhance your gameplay with special skills: Dash to surge forward, Shield for collision protection, and Magnetic to attract food effortlessly. Grow your worm, unlock diverse maps, and personalize your journey. With each game, challenge yourself to beat high scores and master the art of Worm War!

name: Dasha Vasilyeva: The Personal Case of Catwoman
description:
“Dasha Vasilyeva: The Personal Case of Catwoman” is one of the brightest projects in the quest genre of 2009 from CreativeDream Studio. A fascinating detective story, based on the work of the same name by the most popular Russian writer Daria Dontsova, well known to players from her literary bestsellers and numerous television adaptations.

A request for help from a desperate friend becomes the beginning of the incredible adventures of Dasha Vasilyeva. On the eve of the New Year, she will have to unravel a mysterious family intrigue. The unexpected return of deputy Mikhail Medvedev's daughter, who disappeared more than 10 years ago, leads to the most unexpected consequences during Dasha's private investigation.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Seventh Hokage Costume (Gender-Neutral)
description:
Become the envy of every shinobi in the village with this Naruto Uzumaki-styled Seventh Hokage costume!
This costume can be worn by both male and female avatars.

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Jolyne Cujoh Prisoner Uniform Costume
description: Unlock the Prisoner Uniform costume for playable character Jolyne Cujoh for use in-game.

name: Crossout: Horsemen of Apocalypse - Death
description: Sin descripción

Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Kawaki
description:
A special training pack for your avatar!

Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is the one-and-only Kawaki!
Purchasing this DLC will make him available as a master at the Ninjutsu Library, ready to offer Ninjutsu training.

Train with Kawaki to acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

War Thunder: Kfir Canard Pack

War Thunder: King Tiger Pack

This compact police enforcement vehicle is authorized for driving in parks and along narrow streets, allowing you to move throughout Brighton quickly, as you ensure law and order are always respected. Due to its adorable size, it also serves as an excellent photo opportunity for the city's tourism industry!

name: Police Simulator: Patrol Officers - Multipurpose Police Vehicle DLC
description: Sin descripción

description: Don't drop the pins and balls you are juggling.

(Available for the Soviet Tank Commander and Crewman)

Exoprimal: Nimbus Fancy Banshee Set
description:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Support suit Nimbus.
A Fancy Banshee wearing a hard coral exterior! Equip these cosmetic items as you flit around healing your allies like a fairy!

name: Exoprimal: Skywave Fire Guardian Set
description:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Support suit Skywave.
Fire Guardian, a golem wreathed in flames! Equip these cosmetic items as you fly around the battlefield and lead your team to victory!

name: Exoprimal: Vigilant Street Fighter Set
description:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including an exosuit skin that makes your exosuit take on the appearance of Chun-Li, the former ICPO agent who fights with spectacular legwork.
Equip this skin and show off your high-kicking skills!

name: Exoprimal: Krieger Yggdrasil-U Set
description:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Tank suit Krieger.
Yggdrasil-U, recipient of the gifts of Mother Nature! Equip these cosmetic items and protect your team like a sturdy tree!

name: Exoprimal: Vigilant Metallic Cat Set
description:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Assault suit Vigilant.
Look, a shiny kitty! It's the Metallic Cat! Equip these cosmetic items to look fancy as you shoot your enemies.

name: Kamikaze
description: Try to avoid getting sunk by enemy bombers while you are trying to shoot them down.

name: Exoprimal: Murasame Shuten-Doji Set
description:
This pack contains five cosmetic items, including a skin for the Tank suit Murasame.
Shuten-Doji, carrying demons on both shoulders! Equip these cosmetic items and slay your enemies like a demon god!

name: Exoprimal: Zephyr Street Fighter Set
description: This pack contains five cosmetic items, including an exosuit skin that makes your exosuit take on the appearance of Guile, the U.S. Air Force soldier who fights for peace in his homeland. Equip this skin and slice through the air with a Somersault Kick!

name: Christmas Crimes Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:

- Yuletide Legends: Who Framed Santa Claus
- Crime Secrets: Crimson Lily
- Clockwork Tales: Of Glass and Ink
- Lost Grimoires 2: Shard of Mystery
- Demon Hunter: Riddles of Light
- Demon Hunter: Ascendance

name: Family Board Games Bundle
description: This bundle contains our top family board games: Rento Fortune, Happy Words and Farm Builder.

name: Ebbil: Alternative Bible
description: In Heaven, mistakes have been made. In this story inspired by webseries 'The Mandela Catalogue', follow Archangel Gabriel through a trial of corruption and feigned purity as he explores celestial realms and the rekindling of lost friendships. Will you save the Heavens, or will you see them fall?

name: The Game of Life 2: Super Hero World
description: Gear up for an extraordinary journey in the Superhero World! Soar the streets as a Wonder Warrior or harness the power of the stars as a Magical Girl! Immerse yourself in a universe where superheroes craft their destinies with every move.

name: Palm House Pursuit
description: Are you ready to unravel the mysteries of the palm houses and become the catalyst for justice in Miami Beach? The pursuit begins now.

name: Teleport
description: You capture aliens and teleport them off of their planets.

name: Traumatizing Web-Tales
description:
Are you Nostalgic for Internet horror? cool, i am too
This mod is basically... a mod abt Internet horror!!!!

name: Dead by Daylight: Alan Wake Chapter
description: From one Dark Place to another. Dead by Daylight: Alan Wake brings bestselling author Alan Wake into The Fog. Purchasing this add-on unlocks an exclusive universal Charm: Nail Gun.

name: Spy Balloon Freakout
description:
You are a Spy Balloon floating in enemy airspace. A fighter jet has been scrambled to intercept and shoot you down! Worse, surface-to-air missiles are aiming right at you!! Fly! Fly for as long as possible, and see how long you can stay aloft!!

"Saddle up, airman! We've got a bogey at Angels 40!" -Someone, Somewhere

name: Sky Balloon Freakout DX
description:
A highscore game, where you play as a balloon avoiding a fighter-jet and bullets.
"Saddle up, airman! We've got a bogey at Angels 40!" -Someone, Somewhere

name: Ming's Challenge
description: Sci-fi shooter for the Apple II.

name: Stellar Shuttle
description: Lunar Rescue clone

name: Bellhop
description: You deliver the luggage in a six-story hotel.

name: Sonic X Shadow Generations
description: Shadow the Hedgehog is back with Classic and Modern Sonic in Sonic X Shadow Generations, an all-new collection featuring two unique experiences! Play as Shadow in a brand-new story campaign featuring never-before-seen abilities that prove why he's known as the Ultimate Life Form! Speed through iconic stages from Shadow's history, discover hidden secrets in an expansive hub world, and unlock new powers to take on Black Doom and save the world. Sonic X Shadow Generations also includes a complete remaster of the highly acclaimed Sonic Generations, a time-traveling adventure featuring a greatest-hits collection of 3D and 2D Sonic stages, now with upgraded visuals and new bonus content.

name: Foamstars: Season 1
description:
Season One: Starry Pop
The first Season runs between Tuesday February 6, 2024, and Friday March 8, 2024. During that time, you’ll be able to take part in seasonal events where you’ll compete for rankings and enjoy different game modes!

name: Dave the Diver: Godzilla
description:
Dave the Diver: Godzilla is a free DLC update that adds the following content to the base game:

- New missions: Three new Godzilla DLC-exclusive missions have been added.
- New dishes
Discover new dishes inspired by Godzilla and Ebirah
- New Godzilla figures scattered through the ocean

name: Metro Awakening VR
description:
Metro Awakening is a story-driven first person adventure built for VR that blends atmospheric exploration, stealth and combat in the most immersive Metro experience yet.

Don your gas mask, brave the crippling radiation and venture into the depths of the Metro where threats haunt your every…

name: Until Dawn
description:
A remake of Until Dawn, an interactive drama survival horror video game originally released in 2015.

The remake features overhauled visuals, new camera controls, prologue rework, new collectables, new areas and interactions, and a new "Stay Calm" mechanic.

name: Cute Suika: Big Watermelon
description: Cute Suika - Big Watermelon is an adorable and fun game about dropping "fruits" into a container, with a little twist. New features and different game modes. Combine small "fruits" together to make them larger, creating big "watermelons" without overflowing the container, and enjoy the challenge.

name: Candy & Clyde
description:
In this flash game game, you must help Candy & Clyde through a variety of different tasks, chores and games. For each task, you can choose to play as either Candy or Clyde and the task will be slightly different depending on who you choose. Candy is nice and sweet and is always trying to help others. Clyde is mean and is always trying to hurt others. Your goal is to complete each task as quickly as possible and score as many stars as you can. The games start out very easy, but get harder and harder as you go on.

Like in the WarioWare series, Candy & Clyde the player must do 15 different microgames as ether Candy or Clyde as quickly as possible. Players get to choose Candy or Clyde at the start of each microgame with the rules changing slightly depending on the chosen player. The player will get 1 to 5 stars depending on how quickly the task is done and if too much time is taken the player will lose a life. Once the 15 games are done they are repeated in the same order at a harder difficulty level (more items, greater distance etc) and continue to get more difficult until all lives are lost.

name: Panda's Big Adventure
description:
On a secret mission Panda discovers a time traveling 'portaloo' machine.
Our hero decides to go for a ride but things go horribly wrong as parts of the machine are scattered across time.
Travel back as far as the Prehistoric ages to help Panda return home safely.

name: Tattoo Artist
description: Tattoo Artist is a free puzzle game. Learn how to become an artist in this fun game. Choose between two characters as you follow the life of an artist working in a new shop. You need to impress your new boss, so he doesn’t let you go. Your boss will pick your first customer and start you off on an easy one. You’ll be able to read about the customer before you start. Some of them may have more complicated work wanted and some may have low pain tolerance. Make sure to watch the timer, trace the lines, and color within the lines. You can also check your customer’s comfort by looking at the pain meter. This is your only chance so if you don’t do your customer right, you’ll be fired on the spot. Finish all three customers to become a great artist so you can keep your job. Once you get your customer, you’ll first have to trace the outline for the tattoo. You can choose a pen with different thickness to better get the lines right. Once you’re done with the line work, you must fill in the color. You’ll have a picture of what it should look like and you can choose colors for the palette available. This game is definitely harder than it looks so check it out and keep a steady hand.

name: NeverDone
description: NeverDone is a random room dungeon rogue-lite where a hero believes their journey is done. They defeated the Lich and located her last phylactery in the center of this dungeon. Alas, it was a trap and now the hero has to escape an ever expanding dungeon with the phylactery and withstand the lich’s minions.

name: Clown Around
description: An immersive simulator where you play as a clown.

name: Arsonate
description: Outwit the HOST in a death game where fire spreads with each flip of a card. Be the last to burn. Do you fear death?

name: Galactic Gauntlet: The Ultimate Interstellar Challenge
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world where Earth is on the brink of collapse, humanity's last hope lies in finding a new habitable planet. The remaining population resides in the last "green" city, a sanctuary shielded from the desolate wastelands that cover the rest of the planet.

To select the most skilled and resourceful individuals for a crucial space mission, the city's leaders organize an intense competition known as the "Galactic Gauntlet: The Ultimate Interstellar Challenge." This competition consists of a series of grueling obstacle courses designed to test the physical abilities, problem-solving skills, and mental fortitude of the participants.

As a promising candidate, you enter the Galactic Gauntlet, aiming to prove yourself worthy of joining the elite team of explorers who will embark on the interstellar journey to find a new home for humanity. The obstacle courses are not only physically demanding but also simulate the challenges and dangers that await in space, such as zero gravity zones, asteroid fields, and complex puzzles.

Throughout the competition, you'll face fierce rivals, uncover hidden secrets about the mission, and make critical choices that will determine your fate and the fate of humanity. Only the most skilled and resilient will earn a place on the space mission, where they will venture into the unknown to secure a future for mankind.

In this intense competition, players will navigate through treacherous obstacle courses, each designed to test their agility and quick-thinking. You'll need to dodge, jump, and strategize your way past various hazards that threaten to send you back to the last checkpoint you passed. Your ultimate goal? To ascend the leaderboards, outpace your rivals, and etch your name in the annals of the Galactic Gauntlet as the fastest, most cunning competitor in this ultimate interstellar challenge. With each run, you'll hone your skills, learn the nuances of each course, and strive for that flawless run that will secure your place among the stars.

The game's controls are designed to be intuitive and responsive, giving players a sense of agility and precision as they navigate the courses. You can run, sprint to gain speed, slide under obstacles, leap over gaps, and even master the art of wall scaling by deftly jumping back and forth between surfaces. These mechanics not only add depth to the gameplay but also allow for a wide range of movements that make each attempt at a course a thrilling and unique experience. Mastery of these controls is key to making swift progress, avoiding setbacks, and ultimately dominating the leaderboards with grace and style.

name: Twerk Hero: Lil Nas X
description: Twerk something to “Montero (Call Me By Your Name)” in Lil Nas X's Twerk Hero Game!

name: Hazardous Materials
description:
You are Gordon Freeman...

It was a normal working day. Scattered Xen aliens were hiding even in the rear corners of the Black Mesa research facility.
It slowly return normality in everyday work. The old not been destroyed buildings have been modernized slowly.

You return from a normal disposal order, as in parts of the institution the power goes out. Power generators to keep running on the main equipment and and your mission is to restore the energy supply. On the half way you notice more and more Xen returnes to Black Mesa and the military is back ...

Uncover a new, exciting plot in the Half-Life universe!

name: Goodbyes
description:
Alex hasn‘t seen her best friend Naomi in weeks until she suddenly gets a text message inviting her over. Naomi‘s moving. Tomorrow. And this will be Alex' last chance to see her.

But there‘s still so much left unsaid…

name: The Sisters Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Hardcore Platform Bundle
description: A totally Hardcore platform Bundle, challenge yourself and play these four wonderful games created by Rafael V.F, an independent developer.

name: Interstice Academy: Love is Blind
description:
Sitting at the point between worlds, time and space lies a school for beings of all kinds. Welcome to Interstice Academy!

Team Milk Chocolate's entry for Project Blind Date, a one month production jam hosted by the Newgrounds Festivals Server.

name: Food Truck Tycoon + Burger Chef Tycoon + Sweet Bakery Tycoon
description: Satisfy your entrepreneurial appetite with the Food Truck, Burger Chef & Sweet Bakery Tycoon Collection - a recipe for fun and success!

name: Moonshine Inc. + Ruinarch: Bad Habits Bundle

Voice Box Games comin' back at ya with a Tubular, High-Res experience for your home computer! No more driving all the way to the arcade to play your favorites: just play VoiceOS, a short game about doing too much all at once!

Made for Mini Jam 100 by Angus Goucher, Braeden Trefethen, and Jacob Nelan.

description: Take Me or Leaf Me is the world’s first digital houseplant dating sim (as far as we can tell), inspired by other wacky dating sims and set in the Kinder World universe.

name: Love In the Valley
description:
A mysterious new farmer is in town. They're silent, rich, and super hot. The spring flower dance is only a week away! Can you win their affections and score a date with them to the dance?

Stardew Valley meets Monster Prom in this visual novel! You can play as Sebastian or Abigail and visit Cindersap Forest and Town Square.

name: Kritika: Zero

Choose your hero from diverse classes and customize your character to stand out in this action-packed realm.

name: Resetail
description: In this 2D platformer you have to watch out for spikes, obstacles and enemies and make the right moves to find the key to the right door!

name: Railbreak: The Big Break Collection
description: Run! Zombies and dinos are everywhere! Wait, is that a ghost?!

name: Weedcraft Inc + Moonshine Inc + Big Pharma: Chemistry Tycoons Bundle
description: Get 3 tycoon games in one package! Weedcraft Inc + Moonshine Inc + Big Pharma

name: 9Ball Pocket
description: 9-Ball Pocket brings you eight-ball pool, also known as American billiards. You can compete with up to 4 friends or against the AI in Versus mode, or challenge the best in the world in Arcade mode, where you can make combo shots and rack up points to become Number 1 in the online ranking. All of this comes in a setting with great graphics and Jazz music.

name: Railbreak: Dinoblast Collection
description: On-rails zombie shooter and a retro survival horror nightmare? I'm in!

name: Croc's World 4
description: After millions played the first 3 parts of "Croc's World" it´s now time for "Croc's World 4"! "Croc's World 4" is a classical platformer with a lot of new enemies and new twists! It features: + 60 incredible levels on 4 islands!

name: Murder in the Snow Bundle
description:
This bundle includes:

- Yuletide Legends: Who Framed Santa Claus
- Modern Tales: Age of Invention
- Enigmatis 3: The Shadow of Karkhala

name: Session: Skate Sim - Year One Complete Edition
description: With the Year One Complete Edition of Session: Skate Sim, you get the base game and lots of additional content. Ride the most iconic spots, explore unique maps, meet and play as professional skaters.

name: Ballotron Coolbox
description:
Feel the coolness of Christmas in the new part of Ballotron!
Shoot Small Balls to hit Large Balls.
Connect 2 large balls to complete levels.
Break piles of ice and enjoy the atmosphere of winter, presents and holidays.

name: Railbreak: Extra Cheese Collection
description: Dinos and zombies await in three terrifying adventures!

name: Katamari
description: A fanmade Katamari game for the Atari 2600.

name: Gear Heart
description: Sin descripción

name: Prince of Persia
description: The PC-9800 port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description:
The DOS port of Prince of Persia.

Prince of Persia is a cinematic platform game originally developed and published by Broderbund for the Apple II in 1989. Taking place in medieval Persia, players control an unnamed protagonist who must venture through a series of dungeons to defeat the evil Grand Vizier Jaffar and save an imprisoned princess. Ported to a wide range of platforms after the original Apple II release, it is believed to have been the first cinematic platformer, inspiring many games in this subgenre.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The Amiga port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The Atari port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The Sharp X68000 port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The Amstrad CPC port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The SAM Coupé port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The TurboGrafx port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The FM Towns port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The Sega Game Gear and Sega Master System/Mark III port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The Sega CD port of Prince of Persia.

name: Prince of Persia
description: The NES port of Prince of Persia.

name: Princess Paradise
description: "I want that person." The princess's life trajectory intersects with the hearts of the two men.

name: Friendly Snowball
description:
Friendly Snowball is a multiplayer PvP action game.

You prepare for a slippery battle where you hit frosty balls with your giant hammer to score.
You use power ups scattered throughout the arena to help you beat the opponent team.
Play with friends and have fun in a snowy environment!

name: Synso: Squid Harder!
description: Squids with guns! Pink Robots! Devils from the 4th dimension! Shopping Trolleys and Lasers. When 4 worlds collide, only Synso (he's a squid, not an octopus!) can save the day. Psychedelic arena shooter action with visual and aural overload. Just the way sir likes it. Critically acclaimed and star of the Eurogamer Expo 2009 Indie Games Arcade, Squid Harder is an arena shooter like no other.

name: Hook Line & Sinker
description: Hook, Line. and Sinker is a fishing game. You catch fish while fighting them on the water. You can collect gold, collect weapons, and strengthen them.

name: Multiplayer BattleTech: 3025
description: Multiplayer BattleTech: 3025 is an MMO action game, like MechWarrior 4: Vengeance, based on BattleTech: Firestorm arcade machines. The game was released as a beta in 2001 and shut down with little explanation on December 6, 2001.

name: Lion Simulator Survival: RPG Animal Battle
description: Roar through the savannah, hunt prey, and lead your pride in Lion Simulator Survival—an immersive RPG animal battle experience.

name: Borzoi Adventure
description: Will you rise to the challenge and guide the Borzoi to victory in his grand adventure?

name: Town Adventures
description: Immerse yourself in the joy of exploration, tranquility, and discovery. Unwind and relax as you navigate the towns.

name: Master Maker 3D Ultimate
description: Clear retro 3D levels or build your own in this 3D action platformer for all ages!

name: 256 vs. 256
description: This Game is Simple! Light! Dynamic! You can experience playing a classic game of 'Go' or 'Chess' while playing a '3D Real-Time Battle Game'. You can also feel the emotions of the Battle Field.

name: Homesickness
description: A ship falls to a strange planet during an interplanetary voyage, and no one survives except the captain. The captain, faced with a damaged ship, must find a way to repair it on the planet and escape the planet.

name: Ending Name
description: "People can only endure pain after seeing the pain of others." He believes this. Between beautiful dreams and cruel reality, he would not hesitate to choose the former. This is the narrow and prejudiced short text adventure game "终末之名".

name: Zero's Fantastic Anecdote
description: A Danmaku Shooting Game.

name: A Bots Color Adventure
description: Collect orbs, defeat enemies, and explore colorful worlds.

name: Acid Planet
description: Acid Planet is a Tower-Defense RTS Roguelite. Build your base, command your drones and battle to survive against hordes of monsters and gigantic Kaiju.

name: Cat Bang
description: If fighting and adventure make you tired, come and try some casual and puzzle. Catch the falling kitten with open box, so easy.

name: Cat Billiards
description: This is a simple casual game, bring home cats by playing billiards, the cats you bring home can be clicked with the mouse to make cute sounds, will you be able to collect all 50 cats?

name: CatCat Save The World
description: This is RTS puzzle game. One holy girl in other world who call Yuna just complete the Hero Summon, but there has no hero coming from this summon, a cat just show up. That white cat call him as "CatCat" and his name is "GiFi", He steers up the mobile-human armor, and start to save the world.

name: Catnip Dreams
description: Leap into this Catnip-induced Dream, a whimsical 2.5D platformer where you guide an auto-jumping cat through a dreamy world, mastering lateral movement and timing to overcome imaginative challenges and playful obstacles. BEWARE, this game will break you! Play at your own risk >:D

name: Cats in Boxes
description: Dive into 'Cats in Boxes' for an atmospheric adventure with captivating puzzles, cozy vibes, and cats—LOTS OF CATS. Meet unique felines, each with an interesting story, and the handcrafted levels. Find the best spot on your chair, couch, or bed, just like the cats, and enjoy!

name: Cats Everywhere
description: Find cats in a relaxing hidden object game for cat´s lovers. Can you find them all?

name: Cat Search in Feudal Japan
description: The cats are hiding all over this Japanese city! Can you find them all? Sit back, relax, and explore this beautiful hand drawn Japanese city.

name: Cat's Cafeteria
description: Um jogo de Visual Novel, com histórias interessantes e personagens cativantes.

name: Cat & Onion
description: A warm and whimsical cat adventure game where you climb, talk, fly and smack your way to places where no cat has ever gone before! Go on a short yet cosmic journey packed with curious characters, imaginative environments and good vibes.

name: Caught On Camera
description: Survive 6 hours as a night guard, monitoring for anomalies. Act fast, or risk losing your mind to the unexplained horrors that lurk beyond the screens.

name: Cauldron
description: Cauldron is an upgrade-heavy, minigame-centric, turn-based RPG. Play minigames to strengthen your party, then fight battles to uncover more map, more heroes, more minigames, more everything! If your favorite plant is an upgrade tree, then this game is for you!

name: Caustic Bloom
description: In this top-down Metroidvania, descend into the belly of Sarcophagus II, an underground laboratory overrun by mutated creatures. Blast your way through this labyrinth of chaos, facing overwhelming odds in an effort to rescue your friends and recover your humanity.

name: Cave of Illusions: Twistyland
description: A surreal, atmospheric and vivid horror game about a mysterious board game and the little Sophie trapped inside it.

name: Caviar
description: Photograph fish, watch the ecosystem thrive.

name: Card Fencer
description: Journey through distant lands, collect cards to defeat your enemies, and discover other powerful treasures along the way in Card Fencer, a deck building turn-based RPG.

name: Cards and Creatures
description: Enhance your strategy and strengthen bonds with your creatures in this card battling, creature collecting roguelike. Cards and Creatures skilfully blends different genres into one addictive package!

name: CardyHeim
description: CardyHeim is a 2D platformer adventure side view game. Collect Cards and build a deck that will suit your unique way of playing CardyHeim

name: Cargo Duty
description: Your crew is on a mission to collect cargo. As you are going from moon to moon, there are creatures who will try and stop you. How long will you survive ?

name: Celestial Descends
description: "Tianlin Hunyuan" is a Chinese-style Xianxia SRPG with chess strategy and Roguelike elements, set in an open world. Players uncover lies and pursue freedom in a complex world of deep emotions and power struggles, embarking on an epic strategic and emotional adventure.

name: Celestial Impact Invasion
description: First-person Ability Shooter with fast-paced action, bosses, and multiple levels. A meteorite crashes, leaving a powerful resource that others are willing to do anything to obtain, alongside a dangerous creature that arrived with the meteorite. It's up to you to stop them and save the world.

name: Celestwald Adventure
description: Solve captivating quests and puzzles in this hand-drawn point-and-click game.

name: CelV Run
description: CelV Run is the ultimate multiplayer 1v1 race while the floor is lava. In CelV Run you can challenge any of your friends, or you can challenge a player from anywhere in the world. To win just don't fall into the lava and pass through the platforms as quickly as possible.

name: Chatter Challenge
description: "Chatter Challenge" is a GPT-3.5 text adventure game. In just five short minutes, engage in dialogue or actions to interact with unique NPCs, engage in battles, and achieve challenging objectives! Showcase miracles to the Golden Dragon! Defeat the invading demons!

name: Checkers Twist
description: A turn-based strategy game, Checkers Twist is a variant of the checkers board game, where the board is irregular and procedurally generated, offering new tactics each game.

name: Checkout!
description: Checkout! is a casual and chaotic couch multiplayer game for 2-4 players. Dive into a wild shopping spree across the multiverse. Race against your friends to complete your shopping list. Whether locally or online via Remote Play Together, mayhem awaits. Can you shop your way to victory?

name: Chefs Together
description: A coop coking game with light RPG features. Discover new recipes, level up your restaurant, and make sure your customers leave happy in this kitchen game. Best cooking simulator with multiplayer features

name: Chesslike
description: A new outlook on the classic strategy game, battle your way to winning.

name: CleanFall
description: CleanFall is a dynamic tower defense rogue-lite set in a post-apocalyptic subterranean ecosystem. Gather supplies as you descend the abyss, meeting oddities and strangers of every kind. Prepare yourself- the depths will not surrender their secrets easily.

name: Clean The Sea!
description:
Embark on a voyage of environmental salvation and collection with Clean the Sea!—a compelling experience now on Steam.

In a world where the oceans are burdened by humanity's neglect, Clean the Sea! challenges you to pilot a lone vessel on a noble quest: cleanse the waters, rescue marine life, and turn the tide on pollution. As you navigate through tranquil yet troubled waters, your mission is not just to collect refuse but to catalyze change—one scoop of trash at a time.

name: Click To Clear
description: Click to Clear is a minimalist dungeon crawler that combines incremental clicker mechanics with a high fantasy RPG setting. Skillfully fight your way through a campaign spanning multiple diverse biomes against a large variety of challenging enemies and bosses.

name: Clicky
description: Bug-squashing, procedurally generated computer simulation with a heavy focus on 1990s technology and software.

name: Climb Challenge: Find Items Cyberpunk
description: Hidden-object adventure game. The player needs to run around the location and look for objects in secret places, climbing into them along walls and ledges.

name: Climber Animals: Together
description: Climber Animals is a challenging and dynamic parkour game for 1-8 players. In this game,overcome obstacles and climb to the top with your friends. If you fall, your progress is lost and you start over. Keep your balance on this challenging climb and compete with your friends to reach the top.

name: Clumsy Cannon
description: Clumsy Cannon is a game where you play as a box with a cannon, trying to reach the top of different zones. Master the art of cannon propulsion and overcome various obstacles in this unique and challenging game.

name: Cloudy Valley
description: Join the summer camp at Cloudy Valley! Dive into exploring the archipelago to find the camp's pins or relax peacefully by the seaside with a cozy and soothing atmosphere

name: Clocked
description: Two worlds coexist, but one of them didn't exist yesterday. That's why you, an automaton, and your calculator sidekick, are looking for a way out of the Great Clock, searching for answers, but above all to find a way out of this place that's gathering dust.

name: Code Alpha: The Final Frontier
description: In "Code Alpha" battle alien invaders with advanced tech armor. Explore from cities to dungeons in mixed third-person and first-person views. Collect alien tech to upgrade gear and confront massive enemies and bosses. Your ultimate goal: defeat the alien mothership. Brace for a thrilling adventure!

name: Dark Memories: Prologue
description: Rent a cabin for a serene weekend, only to face a series of eerie puzzles in 'Dark Memories: Prologue'—an FPS thriller where every clue is a step towards escape.

name: Lawn Mowing Simulator VR
description: Escape to a world where it’s always sunny and there is always grass that needs mowing – Lawn Mowing Simulator VR allows you to find your inner zen through the art of mowing and string trimming. Reach up, down and all around to maintain your equipment or complete your ground checks and mowing, or just sit back, relax and mow yourself into peacefulness. Explore unique locations and help make them look beautiful again through the power of garden maintenance.

name: Year3055
description: We're in 3055, where AI robots have taken over the world. How will the hero solve this issue?

name: Xilosaga
description: Xilosaga is an action and platform game where you play as Tatuapu, an Indian from a local tribe, who ventures out with the aim of purging a plague within the carrancas, which began to attract evil spirits and dominated the inhabitants of northeastern Brazil.

name: World in fire
description: No boy has never had a superhero dream, now it's your turn to save the human world.

name: Economia: Millennium
description: Dive into economic and strategic mastery with Aporia Interactive's innovative game, Economia: Millennium. Lead your nation as a visionary, navigating the complexities of the 21st-century world in this engaging real-time strategy and economic management experience. Will you lead your nation to unparalleled prosperity, or will you succumb to the challenges of the new millennium?

name: Will The Man Get Frog
description: Will The Man Get Frog is a chill little game about composing silly or sweet haikus (short poems) and sharing them with the world! Don't worry about the blank page, the game will provide words for you. Just arrange them the best you can!

name: WireWalking
description: WireWalking is a wire-walking simulation game that mimics real physics. Players take on the role of acrobats, traveling around the world to undertake wire-walking challenges. Utilize skills to control stamina and balance, and become a master!

name: WitchGhost
description: A spooky adventure through a weird and wonderful land. Boost your powers and change the world as you help Ezme, the WitchGhost, collect her memories so she can remeber how to go home.

name: Wit and Dice
description: WAD is a game where players challenge each other's luck and strategy using 8 dice!

name: Witching Stone
description: Witching Stone is a puzzle game matched with a deckbuilder! Customise your spellbook and weave spells with coloured stones.

name: Monster Scout
description:
Monster Scout is a football game.
You scout players to make a strong football team, but can't check their ability status. You have to judge the ability from the player's characteristics. Since the players move automatically, you can only command the operation in games.

name: Rose & Camellia 2
description:
Welcome back to the elegant art of feminine conflict.

A year has passed since Reiko triumphed over the dark matriarch Madame Camellia and assumed the title of Grand Madame of the Tsubakikoji clan. Saori, the second daughter of the family, who Reiko defeated so ignominiously, can no longer contain her stress level, and at long last she vows revenge on the woman who humiliated her.
Can Saori defeat Reiko and reclaim the life of luxury and indulgence in which she grew up?

name: Rose & Camellia & La-Mulana
description:
Mulbruk, self claimed heroine and Ancient has been sleeping for 3000 years within the ruins of LA-MULANA.
She’s fighting for the title of Heroine of La-Mulana!

name: Bara to Tsubaki to Fata Morgana
description: Sin descripción
